title: Can zakat al fitr (Fitrana) be given in cash? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: some scholars here say that the cattle filter can be given in cash this is the only opinion of imam abu hanifa the vast majority of scholars follow the hadith because the prophet himself haslam ordered that zakat al-fitr to be given out in forms of staple food though they had dirham and dinard they had cash but the prophet instructed them to give it from either dates barley wheat raisin etc so this is the most authentic opinion follow what the prophet ordered you
